rules_text:
{W}: Bureau Recruit becomes a Human Detective with base power and toughness 2/2.
{W}{W}: If Bureau Recruit is a Detective, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes a Human Advisor.
{W}{W}{W}: If Bureau Recruit is an Advisor, whenever it deals combat damage to an opponent this turn, exile target creature that player controls until Bureau Recruit leaves the battlefield.
